Bash(git -C /Users/jstn/Documents/GitHub/FMMLoader-26 commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: remove debug helper entirely

The debug helper was causing build failures due to Tauri bundler
attempting to include it regardless of feature flags. Remove it
entirely rather than fighting with caches and cross-platform issues.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Bash(git -C /Users/jstn/Documents/GitHub/FMMLoader-26 commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: use universal binary instead of separate x86_64 build

Universal binary includes both arm64 and x86_64, eliminating the need
for a separate x86_64 build. This halves macOS build time and reduces
signing/notarization overhead.

EOF
)")

prevent keychain from locking during long universal builds. Also
adds find-identity to verify certificate import.

Bash(git -C /Users/jstn/Documents/GitHub/FMMLoader-26 commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: split name_fix.rs into module structure

Split the monolithic 1,290-line name_fix.rs into organized submodules:
- name_fix/mod.rs - Public API and common functions
- name_fix/db.rs - Platform-specific database path detection
- name_fix/backup.rs - Backup and restore operations  
- name_fix/import.rs - Import name fixes from ZIP
- name_fix/install.rs - Install/uninstall name fixes
